name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump tweeted that our criminal justice system is a “joke.” He then tweeted, “I mean, how is my entire family not in prison?”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The Republican tax plan came out today and President Trump announced that it will bring trillions of dollars to the U.S. He then said, “Specifically, to three members of my Cabinet.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump tweeted congratulations to the Houston Astros for winning the World Series. Trump said he’s so happy for the Astros, he’s only going to deport some of the players.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A gambler won $14 million on last night’s World Series game. Here’s what’s suspicious — turns out it was some guy named Yu Darvish.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Amazon has unveiled a new way to view its products in 3-D. Amazon is calling its new invention “a store.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In an interview, “Jeopardy” host Alex Trebek revealed that he once tripped hard on hash brownies. Apparently, Trebek spent hours saying “What is, ‘my hand’ for 800?”
